content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ACTARMCD
      operator: longer_than
      value: 20
Core:
  Id: CORE-000185
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error if length of ACTARMCD is greater than 20 characters
Outcome:
  Message: Length of ACTARMCD is greater than 20 characters
  Output Variables:
    - ACTARMCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0123
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Code of actual Arm. ACTARMCD is limited to 20 characters.
                  It is not subject to the character restrictions that apply to TESTCD.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Trigger error if length of ACTARMCD is greater than 20 characters

Outcome.Message: Length of ACTARMCD is greater than 20 characters

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Code of actual Arm. ACTARMCD is limited to 20 characters. It is not subject to the character restrictions that apply to TESTCD.
